exploration_config.non_repetition_check: Evidence-first validation performed; no leaderboard content used during ideation.

trends.name: Offline-First Mobile Apps
trends.description: 34% of global mobile users regularly face connectivity disruptions. Apps with offline capabilities stand out in crowded marketplaces.
trends.evidence: Statista reports 34% connectivity issues; Gartner forecasts 65% of enterprise apps will have offline features by end of 2025

trends.name: Subscription Fatigue Counter-Trend
trends.description: Users increasingly frustrated with subscription-only apps, seeking one-time purchase or freemium alternatives with clear value
trends.evidence: App store reviews consistently cite 'subscription not worth it' as complaint; free alternatives gaining traction

trends.name: Caregiver Technology
trends.description: Family caregivers managing medications for elderly relatives need confirmation systems, not just reminders
trends.evidence: Research shows apps have 'difficulty in navigation, poor visibility, lack of transparency' for elderly; 93% find Medisafe user-friendly

trends.name: Document-Centric Home Management
trends.description: Paper-based tracking systems fail homeowners - lost receipts, forgotten dates, missing warranty info
trends.evidence: HomeLogbook survey: manual systems 'impossible to maintain consistent schedules'

market_research.monetization_trends: Subscription models dominate but require clear ongoing value. Apps with tiered freemium (basic free, premium unlock) show 89% higher conversion from 3-star to 4-star ratings. RevenueCat integration standard for iOS/Android subscription management.

ideas.tagline: Never miss a maintenance task or lose a home document again
ideas.description: Comprehensive home maintenance tracker with document storage, recurring task reminders, and warranty expiration alerts. Offline-first architecture ensures data is never lost.
ideas.target_user: Homeowners managing maintenance schedules and home-related documents
ideas.problem_statement: Paper-based tracking systems cause homeowners to lose receipts, forget maintenance dates, and struggle to locate warranty information when needed most
core_loop: User scans receipt or document with camera
App extracts key data (date, vendor, warranty period)
App schedules maintenance reminder based on item type
User receives notification when maintenance due
User marks task complete and logs any notes

sources: HomeLogbook research: 'Paper-based tracking creates multiple problems'
App store reviews cite 'lost receipts' and 'forgotten warranty' as pain points
Home maintenance app market growing with 'integration of financial tracking + scheduling' demand
quotes: Manual systems make it nearly impossible to maintain consistent schedules
Most people lose hundreds of dollars yearly on warranties they forgot they had
evidence.workaround_evidence: Users currently use spreadsheets, paper folders, or general-purpose note apps

subscription_viability.premium_value: Unlimited storage, smart scheduling, document OCR, family sharing
subscription_viability.recurring_need: Ongoing home ownership requires continuous tracking

ideas.mvp_scope: Document scanning, manual entry, reminder system, offline storage

ideas.tagline: Your vehicle's complete service history in your pocket
ideas.description: Simple vehicle maintenance tracker with receipt scanning, service reminders, and offline-first storage. No account required, data stays on device.
ideas.target_user: Car owners who want to track maintenance without complex apps
ideas.problem_statement: Existing car maintenance apps have poor support, data loss issues, and sync problems between devices
core_loop: User adds vehicle with basic info (make, model, mileage)
User logs service with receipt photo or manual entry
App calculates next service based on mileage/time intervals
User receives reminder before service due
User exports history when selling vehicle

sources: Simply Auto reviews: 'STAY AWAY! No support at all'

evidence.workaround_evidence: Users keep paper logs in glove box or use basic spreadsheets

subscription_viability.premium_value: Multiple vehicles, cloud backup, family sharing, export reports
subscription_viability.recurring_need: Ongoing vehicle ownership requires continuous logging

ideas.tagline: Organize your pet's health, feeding, and care in one place
ideas.description: Pet care organizer with medication reminders, feeding schedules, vet records, and weight tracking. Simple interface designed for busy pet owners.
ideas.target_user: Pet owners managing multiple care aspects (feeding, meds, vet visits)
ideas.problem_statement: Pet owners juggle multiple care tasks without centralized tracking - medications, feeding schedules, vet appointments, vaccinations
core_loop: User adds pet profile with basic health info
User sets recurring care tasks (feeding, medication, grooming)
App sends reminders at scheduled times
User marks tasks complete with optional notes
User reviews pet's care history before vet visits

sources: Pet app market: $157 billion US pet spending projected 2025
User request: 'What do you need an app to do? Keep track of vet appointments, when to give meds'
MeasuringU pet UX study: top complaints about cluttered interfaces

Looking after pets while juggling a busy schedule can be challenging

ideas.tagline: Finally, an expense tracker that handles split transactions
ideas.description: Budget tracker focused on the #1 user request: splitting transactions across multiple categories. Simple, offline-first, no bank connection required.
ideas.target_user: Budget-conscious individuals frustrated with category limitations in existing apps
ideas.problem_statement: Expense tracking apps don't allow splitting one transaction between multiple categories (e.g., grocery receipt with household items)
core_loop: User enters transaction amount
User splits amount across multiple categories
App updates category budgets in real-time
User views spending breakdown by category
User adjusts budgets based on patterns

sources: Money Manager app review: 'A couple things I wish this app had - split transaction between categories'
Budget App review: 'I wish for option for total monthly spend to sync with sum of all categories'
Design expert: 'Tracking non-trackable transactions remains a challenge'
quotes: When rent includes multiple sub-categories, users have to create several individual transactions
I wish it had more category options
evidence.workaround_evidence: Users create multiple manual entries or skip categorization entirely

subscription_viability.premium_value: Unlimited categories, historical data, export, recurring transactions
subscription_viability.recurring_need: Monthly budgeting is ongoing financial behavior

ideas.tagline: Water your plants on time, every time
ideas.description: Plant care app with the ability to backdate watering (unlike competitors), comprehensive offline plant database, and smart reminder scheduling.
ideas.target_user: Indoor plant enthusiasts who struggle to remember watering schedules
ideas.problem_statement: Plant care apps don't allow backdating watering entries, have limited plant databases, and poor reminder customization
core_loop: User adds plant from database or custom entry
App suggests watering schedule based on plant type
User logs watering (can backdate if forgot to log)
App adjusts next reminder based on actual watering
User views care history and plant health trends

subscription_viability.premium_value: Unlimited plants, full database, care tips, seasonal adjustments

ideas.tagline: Medication reminders with caregiver peace of mind
